column2: SELECT * FROM students WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'

column1: JOIN student_course sc ON c.id = sc.id_course
JOIN students s ON sc.id_student = s.id
JOIN teacher_course tc ON c.id = tc.id_course
JOIN teachers t ON tc.id_teacher = t.id
